alert.note: Alert for Catalina and Santa Barbara Islands; Malibu Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued January 06 at 10:08PM PST until January 07 at 6:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Large breaking waves of 10 to 14 feet with local sets to 16 feet and dangerous rip currents. * WHERE...Catalina and Santa Barbara Islands, especially west and northwest facing shores. * WHEN...Until 6 PM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...There is an increased risk for ocean drowning. Rip currents can pull swimmers and surfers out to sea. Large breaking waves can cause injury, wash people off beaches and rocks, and capsize small boats near shore.
info.instruction: Remain out of the water due to dangerous surf conditions, or stay near occupied lifeguard towers. Rock jetties can be deadly in such conditions, stay off the rocks.

area.areaDesc: Catalina and Santa Barbara Islands; Malibu Coast
